Uses of Interface
fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.fs.IPath

  • Packages that use IPath 
    Package Description
    fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.fs
    Services for working with real and virtual file systems, including file watcher services.
    fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.http
    Services for handling HTTP communications, including management of the embedded web server.

    • Uses of IPath in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.fs

      Methods in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.fs that return IPath 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IPath IPath.createFolder()
      Creates a folder for this path, if the path can represent a folder.
      IPath IFileSystemDriver.createFolder(IPath path)
      Creates a folder for the specified path, if the path can represent a folder.
      IPath IPath.getFolderPath()
      Gets the structured path of the folder containing this file or folder.
      IPath IFileWatcher.getPath()
      Gets the path of the watched file or directory.
      IPath IFileSystemView.getPath(String path)
      Gets a structured path for this filesystem, specified as a string.
      IPath IFileSystemService.getPath(String path, IFileSystemDriver fs)
      Converts a string into a structured path attached to the specified filesystem.
      IPath IFileSystemView.getRoot()
      Gets the root path.
      IPath IFileSystemDriver.getRoot()
      Gets the root path.
      IPath IFileEventContext.getTarget()
      Gets the target affected by the event, as a logical path.
      IPath IPath.item(String childItemName)
      Gets the path of a child item, if the item exists.
      IPath IPath.item(String childItemName, boolean createPathIfNoItem)
      Gets the path of a child item, optionally permitting the creation of paths to non-existent items.
      Methods in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.fs that return types with arguments of type IPath 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<IPath> IPath.getFoldersFromRoot()
      Gets the list of structured path elements, starting from the root and continuing to this path's parent folder.
      List<IPath> IFileSystemDriver.list(IPath path)
      Lists child directory paths for the specified parent path.
      List<IPath> IPath.listPaths()
      Gets the list of child paths (contents of the directory if this is a folder).
      Methods in fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.fs with parameters of type IPath 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T IFileSystemDriver.as(IPath path, Class<T> asType)
      Gets the specified path as an object of the specified type.
      IPath IFileSystemDriver.createFolder(IPath path)
      Creates a folder for the specified path, if the path can represent a folder.
      Charset IFileSystemDriver.getFileCharset(IPath path)
      Gets the character encoding of the file, if this path represents a text file and if the encoding can be determined.
      long IFileSystemDriver.getFileSize(IPath path)
      Gets the size of the file, if this path represents a file and if the size can be efficiently determined.
      InputStream IFileSystemDriver.getInputStream(IPath path)
      Gets an input stream to read the contents of the file with the specified path.
      long IFileSystemDriver.getLastModified(IPath path)
      Gets the time of the last modification for the path.
      OutputStream IFileSystemDriver.getOutputStream(IPath path)
      Gets an output stream to write the contents of the file with the specified path.
      IFileWatcher IFileSystemDriver.getWatcher(IPath path)
      Gets a watcher for changes to a specific file path or under a specific folder path.
      <T> boolean IFileSystemDriver.is(IPath path, Class<T> ofType)
      Determines if the specified path can be converted to an object of the specified type.
      boolean IFileSystemDriver.isFile(IPath path)
      Determines if the specified path exists and is a file.
      boolean IFileSystemDriver.isFileSystem(IPath path)
      Determines if the specified path exists and is an embedded filesystem.
      boolean IFileSystemDriver.isFolder(IPath path)
      Determines if the specified path exists and is a folder.
      boolean IFileSystemDriver.isHidden(IPath path)
      Determines if the path represents a hidden file or folder.
      boolean IFileSystemDriver.isReadable(IPath path)
      Determines whether the specified path is known to be readable.
      boolean IFileSystemDriver.isWatchable(IPath path)
      Determines if the specified path is a watchable file or folder.
      boolean IFileSystemDriver.isWriteable(IPath path)
      Determines whether the specified path is known to be writeable.
      List<IPath> IFileSystemDriver.list(IPath path)
      Lists child directory paths for the specified parent path.

      void IHttpServiceCall.sendData(IPath source)

      Builds and sends the response based on data contained by the specified source.
      void IHttpServiceCall.sendFileDownload(CharSequence usingFileName, String usingContentType, IPath source)
      Sends a file (read from a virtual path) as a download to the client.
